text: �In their drunkenness they were bewildered.That is, in their ignorance (jahl) and error (ḍalāla) they disobey. Know that all acts of disobediencemay be attributed to ignorance, and [all] ignorance may be attributed to intoxication [with the world]. It is said that it [the world] is just like [an] intoxicating drink (muskir).His words, Exalted is He:
